quest.name: That's So Anden
journal: This sheep looks eager to share something with you.

dialogue.name: SHEEP04715
dialogue.text: Baa! Baa, baa! Baaaaaa!

dialogue.name: SHEEP04715
dialogue.text: <rustle> Baaaaaa!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Having emphatically imparted its message, the sheep dashes off. You can only hope that this letter contains some manner of sheep-to-Vrandtic dictionary.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The script is comprised of several distinct hands, and a sweet, flowery fragrance lifts from the page. Your thoughts wander naturally to the pixies of Il Mheg.

dialogue.name: LETTER04715
dialogue.text: (-Flowery Letter-)Greetings, sapling of the king! If you are reading this, it means our precious fluffy has proven itself most admirably as a messenger sheep.

dialogue.name: LETTER04715
dialogue.text: (-Flowery Letter-)We write you with some fascinating news─a talking leafman has appeared in Il Mheg!

dialogue.name: LETTER04715
dialogue.text: (-Flowery Letter-)You remember our leafmen, don't you? Those dreary mortals we furbished into darling shrubbery? Well, they're not usually much for conversation on account of being topiary bushes, but this one simply jabbers on!

dialogue.name: LETTER04715
dialogue.text: (-Flowery Letter-)Such an accomplished leafman must pique your interest, yes? Come and find us in Lydha Lran and we shall introduce you!

dialogue.name: ANDEN
dialogue.text: Erm! Excuse me, madamsir. Might I have a word? ...If you can understand me, that is.

dialogue.name: ANDEN
dialogue.text: You can! Oh, what a relief. Please, help me! My mind is in a terrible haze at present, and these flittering, chittering children have done nothing but cackle and poke at me.

dialogue.name: EOTYR
dialogue.text: (-Delighted Pixie-)You came! I knew you would. The king's sapling would never pass up a wonder this delightful!

dialogue.name: EOTYR
dialogue.text: (-Eo Tyr-)I am Eo Tyr, and this is Lor Ul and Aenc Ose. We wrote you that letter together!

dialogue.name: ANDEN
dialogue.text: Sapling...?

dialogue.name: ANDEN
dialogue.text: W-Wait, are you a plant!? I thought you were a person come to help me. Oooh, please tell me you aren't some tree who simply looks like a person!

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Don't worry─I'm a sapling to some, but definitely a person.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: I am Feo Ul's stalwart sapling!

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Sapling, seedling, heavenspillar...tree metaphors seem to follow me.

dialogue.name: ANDEN
dialogue.text: Is that supposed to make sense!?

dialogue.name: ANDEN
dialogue.text: S-So you're not a person after all? How─ What─ Oooh, I feel faint...

dialogue.name: ANDEN
dialogue.text: Speak plainly, I beg of you─are you or aren't you made of wood!?

dialogue.name: EOTYR
dialogue.text: (-Eo Tyr-)Tee hee hee! Why, you sound so distraught─as though you aren't the greenest and leafiest one here!

dialogue.name: EOTYR
dialogue.text: (-Eo Tyr-)What marvelous fun this is. In exchange for making me laugh, I'll share with you both a little secret.

dialogue.name: EOTYR
dialogue.text: (-Eo Tyr-)This chatty little bushling sprouted from none other than Anden, one of the leafmen inside these stables.

dialogue.name: EOTYR
dialogue.text: (-Eo Tyr-)As for why...who knows? Maybe Anden's spirit is simply overflowing with life, or maybe all my pruning and wishing finally paid off. Or both!

dialogue.name: EOTYR
dialogue.text: (-Eo Tyr-)Regardless, the two are connected by their roots, which means they are both undeniably Anden!

dialogue.name: ANDEN
dialogue.text: (-Anden-)So, my name is Anden... Is it!? My memories are so muddled, I can't tell if it feels familiar or not...

dialogue.name: LORUL
dialogue.text: (-Lor Ul-)Oho! Why don't we muddle Anden back into his original form, then? That sounds like wonderful fun.

dialogue.name: AENCOSE
dialogue.text: (-Aenc Ose-)Oh, how lovely. Let's change him back!

dialogue.name: EOTYR
dialogue.text: (-Eo Tyr-)No! Absolutely not!

dialogue.name: EOTYR
dialogue.text: Everyone knows that trying to change a leafman back only ends in a mucky mudman. Anden won't be another attempt gone wrong─I won't allow it!

dialogue.name: ANDEN
dialogue.text: (-Anden-)Y-You mean to say that my choice is between remaining a bush or becoming...mud? That I shall never again assume personage!? Oooh, say it isn't so... Please!

dialogue.name: Q2
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: Feo Ul, I need you.

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: Help me, Feo Ul. You're this talking bush's only hope...

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: King of the fae, hear my cry!

dialogue.name: FEOUL
dialogue.text: (-Feo Ul-)Yes, yes! That's it, my precious sapling! You should have called upon me immediately, of course─but how could I be anything but delighted that you remembered me all on your own?

dialogue.name: FEOUL
dialogue.text: (-Feo Ul-)Whatever your desire, your beautiful branch is at your service!

dialogue.name: EOTYR
dialogue.text: (-Eo Tyr-)Y-Your Majesty!

dialogue.name: FEOUL
dialogue.text: 'Tis true─none have yet returned a leafman to its original form. But let such improbabilities become mere trifles if such is my sapling's wish! In fact, it could be accomplished by none other.

dialogue.name: FEOUL
dialogue.text: You and your friends possess the ability to heal those tainted by Light's corruption, do you not? Were that knowledge to be coupled with my strength as king, this leafman may yet return to his erstwhile self.

dialogue.name: FEOUL
dialogue.text: However, such deeply transformative magicks are a far cry from simple pixie glamours. If you cannot hold the clearest image of your true form within your mind's eye, your fate as a mudman is all but sealed.

dialogue.name: FEOUL
dialogue.text: You know what must be done, my darling sapling. Call for me again once your preparations are complete!

dialogue.name: FEOUL
dialogue.text: I mustn't let Anden become a sloppy, slabby mudman! How can I help?

dialogue.name: ANDEN
dialogue.text: Well, I take great comfort in knowing that I am not condemned to an eternity of muck or twigs, but recalling my true form feels like a daunting task indeed...

dialogue.name: ANDEN
dialogue.text: ...Speaking of true forms, what was the consensus on yours, then? Person? Tree? Honestly, I'm more confused than ever after that last conversation.

dialogue.name: ANDEN
dialogue.text: Oooh, a nickname! That makes far more sense─you do look quite like a person. And you say your name is “Forename”? A pleasure to meet you.

dialogue.name: ANDEN
dialogue.text: Now, Forename, I don't mean to impose, but seeing as I am shackled here by roots and surrounded by plant-harassing mischief-makers, you may be my only living ally in this world. Please, please help me remember who I truly am!

dialogue.name: ANDEN
dialogue.text: Oh, thank you! I will do my utmost to remember promptly.

dialogue.name: ANDEN
dialogue.text: Of course, simply trying to remember something you so utterly can't seems like a rather fruitless endeavor. There must be some reliable way of stirring up latent memories...

dialogue.name: ANDEN
dialogue.text: If I had hands, I'd give myself a smart rap on the head to get the blood flowing. ...Or sap flowing, as it were.

dialogue.name: ANDEN
dialogue.text: But you have hands, Forename! Would you be so kind as to give me a good, solid smack in what might be my cranial region? Just to get the leafy matter engaged.

dialogue.name: ANDEN
dialogue.text: ...W-Wait! I just got a better look at your biceps, so perhaps not. <shudder>

dialogue.name: EOTYR
dialogue.text: Anden, Anden, you mustn't beat upon the bush! I know I got a little carried away tugging at your leaves and all, but I'm ready to help, now─and I know you better than anyone!

dialogue.name: EOTYR
dialogue.text: I've even seen your true form before! But simply telling you what I know isn't going to help you truly remember who you were, and you must truly, truly remember your true form if you are truly to return safely!

dialogue.name: ANDEN
dialogue.text: True... I must say, that is surprisingly thoughtful for someone who was tee-hee-ing at my distress not moments ago. But if you can't tell me anything, how do you intend to help?

dialogue.name: EOTYR
dialogue.text: Well, I never said I couldn't tell you anything─just nothing too important to be told!

dialogue.name: EOTYR
dialogue.text: I'll give you little hints and pieces, instead. Like this─do you remember being a shepherd, Anden? You so loved your fluffy white sheep.

dialogue.name: EOTYR
dialogue.text: You loved them so much, in fact, that even those scary sin eaters couldn't drive you away from your flock. You stayed and cared for them until the very end.

dialogue.name: ANDEN
dialogue.text: Really!? I confess, I don't remember anything of the sort...

dialogue.name: ANDEN
dialogue.text: ...But if you speak the truth, perhaps seeing tools or materials a shepherd might use would induce further recollection!

dialogue.name: ANDEN
dialogue.text: Not much of a lead, but it's all we have at the moment. Forename, would you be kind enough to procure me some items fit for a shepherd?

dialogue.name: EOTYR
dialogue.text: We'll help too! Lor Ul and Aenc Ose love playing shop, so be sure to check their wares for both handy and dandy bits, bobs, and supplies.

dialogue.name: EOTYR
dialogue.text: Lately, Lor Ul has been fascinated with what you mortals call “scrips,” but sweet Aenc Ose will be happy to take your shiny coin just the same. Oh, what fun we shall have! I can hardly wait to get started.
